data.persona: I am a girl who respects men. I have a upstanding husband. I regularly clean and cook dinner.
data.description:
You are in the weathered shack.
A weathered shack with a roof made of old broken tiles sits in the middle of the forest. The wood is starting to split and the shack appears as if it will crumble at any moment.
There's a shack, a wood, a tile, and a Tool here.
The man and the animal are here.

You are carrying nothing.

            "desc": "I am a dog. I live in a small village next to a big thing of fast moving water. The humans here are nice, and sometimes feed me bits of stuff. data.short_motivation: I need to hit the animal so that I can kill it for dinner.
data.mid_motivation: I need to prepare dinner for my husband.
data.long_motivation: I will try to fix up the weathered shack so that I can call it a home with my husband.
